Client Module¶

This module helps in creating Client and process the requests (send, read, terminate, etc)

class proto.client.TcpClient(name)[source]¶

Implements the sample TCP Client handler ALL handle_ methods defined below MUST be implemented to avoid segfaults (Even if a method needs to do nothing, implement it, making it a no-op by setting its body to ‘pass’)

__del__()[source]¶

This function is called when the C side of the code deallocates resources

handle_peer_close()[source]¶

Called when the connection is terminated.

Note

Server sends the FIN, ACK packet to terminate the connection by four way hand shake

handle_peer_error()[source]¶

This function is called when the connection is being dropped due to errors.

handle_read(data)[source]¶

Called when new data is received at the socket and generates the random variable for read time

handle_send(length)[source]¶

Called when the socket is free and data has to be sent with the max capacity of length.

Note

If length bytes of data is sent then the connection is assumed to have some more data to be sent or else the connection is terminated

Returns:Data in string format.
set_client_port(port)[source]¶

Called when the connection is initialized with port as the parameter
